Bawa Narkoba Pakai Kondom, Pengunjung Rutan Depok di Bekuk Petugas
07 Nov 2019, 21:09 by Rido Lingga, S.Kom


Bawa Narkoba Pakai Kondom, Pengunjung Rutan Depok di Bekuk Petugas

KBRN, Depok: Petugas Keamanan Rutan Kelas II B Cilodong, Kota Depok berhasil menggagalkan upaya penyeludupan narkotika jenis sabu-sabu ke dalam Rutan Depok saat jam kunjungan, pada Rabu (6/11/2019) kemarin.Nakotika jenis sabu-sabu itu diseludupkan seorang pengunjung wanita berinisial H yang datang bersama anaknya. Dia mendaftar untuk kunjungan di loket kunjungan Rutan Depok, pada pukul 14:00 WIB."Setelah mendapat nomor antrian pada pukul 14:15 WIB, petugas terlebih dahulu memeriksa barang-barang bawaan H menggunakan mesin X-ray sesuai dengan prosedur yang berlaku, yang kemudian barang-barang bawaan tersebut akan diambil H didalam ruang kunjungan," kata Kepala Rutan Kelas II B Cilodong Kota Depok Bawono Ika Sutomo kepada RRI, Kamis (7/11/2019).Selesai memeriksa barang-barang bawaannya, tiba giliran petugas memerika badan H dan anaknya. H dan anaknya dilakukan penggeledahan badan diruangan penggeledahan badan khusus wanita.Saat melakukan penggeledahan, petugas mencurigai sesuatu di genggaman H. Petugas ET kemudian memeriksa isi genggaman tangan H, dan ternyata di dalam genggam telapak tangan kiri H terdapat narkotika jenis sabu-sabu yang dimasuk kan kedalam alat kontrasepsi (kondom) dengan dilapisi plastik dan di bungkus tisu."Selanjutnya petugas mengamankan barang haram itu dan H serta menggeledah H lebih jauh dan melaporkan hasil temuan tersebut kepada pimpinan," ujarnya.Dari dalam genggaman telapak tangan H, petugas Rutan Depok berhasil mengamankan narkotika jenis sabu-sabu yang di bungkus dalam paket kecil sebanyak 6 buah dengan berat 5 gram.Setelah mengamankan barang bukti dan tersangka, lanjut Bawono, pihaknya langsung berkoordinasi dengan Satnarkoba Polresta Depok. Hingga berita ini diturunkan kasus ini saat ini masih dalam pengembangan Satnarkoba Polresta Depok.Â

Bring Drugs with Condoms, Depok Detention Center Visitors in Bekukan Officers
07 Nov 2019, 21:09 by Rido Lingga, S.Kom


Bring Drugs with Condoms, Depok Detention Center Visitors in Bekukan Officers

KBRN, Depok: Class II B Detention Center Security Officer in Cilodong, Depok City succeeded in thwarting smuggling of methamphetamine drugs into the Depok Detention Center during visiting hours, on Wednesday (6/11/2019) yesterday. The methamphetamine narcotics was smuggled by a person female visitors with the initial H who come with their children. He registered for a visit at the Depok Detention Center counter, at 14:00 WIB. "After obtaining a queue number at 14:15 WIB, officers first checked H's luggage using an X-ray machine in accordance with applicable procedures, which then the luggage will be taken H in the visiting room, "said Head of Class II B Detention Center Cilodong Depok City Bawono Ika Sutomo to RRI, Thursday (11/07/2019). After checking his luggage, it was the turn of the officer to examine the body H and his child. H and his son were searched by a woman's body search room. When conducting a search, officers suspected something in H.'s hand. The ET officer then checked the contents of H's hand grip, and it turned out that in the hand's left hand H there was a type of methamphetamine entered. into a contraceptive (condom) covered with plastic and wrapped in a tissue. "Furthermore, officers secured the illicit goods and H and searched H further and reported the findings to the leadership," he said. From within the palm of H's hand, the Depok Detention Officer succeeded securing methamphetamine type narcotics wrapped in small packages of 6 pieces weighing 5 grams. After securing evidence and suspects, continued Bawono, his party immediately coordinated with the Depok Police Satnarkoba. Until this news was revealed this case is currently still in the development of the Depok Police Satnarkoba.
